high_descs: turn around, take a couple steps, turn right, walk towards the desk
pick up the alarm clock that is on the desk
turn left, take one step, turn right to face desk in front of the lamp
turn the lamp on
anns.task_desc: examine alarm clock with a lamp

high_descs: Move across the room to the left side of the brown desk where the clock is
Pick up the clock on top of the desk
Carry the clock to the face the lamp on top of the desk
Turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: Carry a clock while turning on a lamp

high_descs: Turn around 180 degrees and walk to the desk then turn right and walk to the other desk
Pick up the alarm clock from the desk
Turn left then right and face the desk while holding on to the alarm clock
Turn on the lamp that is on the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine the alarm clock by the light of the small lamp

high_descs: Turn around and then walk until you reach the end of the table to your right then walk towards the table until you reach it.
Grab the alarm clock next to the green lamp.
Turn to the left walk one step and then turn to the right.
Turn on the green lamp in front of you.
anns.task_desc: Grab an alarm clock turn on the green lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk until you hit the desk chair then turn right and walk to the desk and face it.
Pick up the alarm clock off of the desk.
Shift slightly to your left still facing the desk.
Turn on the light on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the light on the desk as you hold an alarm clock.

high_descs: Turn left towards the alarm clock on the desk.
Pick up the alarm clock from the desk.
Turn left and then right to face the lamp.
Turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine an alarm clock by the light of a lamp.
